title: Senior Application Developer
tagsAndSkills: Computer science,MS SQL,Project management,Moss,SSRS,Agile,Application development,Visual Studio
jobDescription:
The Senior Application Developer functions as the Technical Lead on the firm s application development projects. The role liaises with other resources on the project to represent the work of the Development team and may oversee the work of other development resources on the project. The role is responsible for building new custom applications, extending existing applications and building interfaces between custom and packaged solutions. An individual should have a sound grasp of application development approaches and software development lifecycles.
Individuals who thrive at Moss Adams exhibit the following success skills Collaboration, Critical Thinking, Emotional Intelligence, Executive Presence, Growth Mindset, Intellectual Curiosity, and Results Focus.

Responsibilities:
  • Manage and provide direction for the team in support of business products
  • Lead the development of standalone desktop solutions or web applications using C#/.Net
  • Maintain and exercise a highly accomplished level of capability in the firm s technologies and methodologies including Visual Studio, MS SharePoint, C#,.Net, MS SQL Server, Team Foundation Server, SQL, SSRS, and other application tools/languages
  • Translate business requirement into clearly documented technical designs
  • Collaborate with Project Management to develop task estimates and project work plans
  • Lead the design of application databases including table and index design, database normalization and de- normalization, stored procedure and view creation
  • Lead the troubleshooting of data and technical issues and can develop troubleshooting skills in other team members
  • Lead work efforts involving primarily development resources and communicate status effectively with relevant business users
  • Manage the scheduling of development resources to achieve successful delivery as requirements and priorities change
Qualifications:
  • Bachelors degree or equivalent experience required; emphasis in computer science or related field preferred\
  • Minimum of 7 years of related experience required; experience in a professional services environment preferred
  • Experience with Microsoft development tools developing and supporting web-based business applications,
  • Experience with techniques and methodologies such as Object Oriented, Model-driven Architecture, Waterfall and Agile
  • Extensive knowledge of and experience in the broad suite of Microsoft development tools and is able to develop junior developers in the use of said tools
  • Experience developing applications in the Cloud a plus
  • Microsoft certifications preferred
  • Ability to collaborate and work effectively across teams while building trusted relationships and positively influencing others
  • Self-directed professional with strong interpersonal skills
  • Effective time management and organizational skills, proven ability to prioritize while simultaneously managing numerous project/processes often under tight deadlines

title: IOS App Developer
jobDescription:
• Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code from day one
  • Write and maintain high-performance, reusable, and reliable Swift/Objective C code
  • Quickly learn and apply new iOS development methods and be updated with trends to maximize development efficiency.
  • Communicate well and collaborate with backend, design, and campaign teams
  • Improve the quality standard of the apps
  • Innovate to increase the desirability of apps/help in I-PAC campaigns

Minimum Qualifications:
  • A Bachelors degree (preferably in computer science or a related field)
  • 2 years of experience in the iOS app development field.
  • Strong OO design and programming skills in Swift/Objective C.
  • Hands-on experience with Xcode5 and above, JSON, and REST APIs.
  • Understanding of delegates, constraints, basic UI elements, and application life cycle

Preferred Qualifications:
  • Experience in using APIs and third-party libraries (Alamofire, AFNetworking, Maps)
  • Experience in implementing MVP/MVVM architecture
  • Experience with Storyboards, Pickers, View Transitions, and Scroll View
  • Knowledge of user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
  • Working knowledge of design patterns like Builder, Singleton, Adapter pattern, etc.
  • Experience in writing test cases
  • Knowledge of using Git, Git branches, and GitHub to manage codebases
  • Knowledge of different analytics tools to analyze app data

title: SW Application Developer
jobDescription:
• Develop custom Automotive applications (In C++) for Instrument cluster and Infotainment according to customer specifications, satisfying the performance, latency, power, robustness, and stability requirements.
  • Will be involved in all stages of Software development including Requirement Analysis, Design, Development and testing.
  • Work in an Agile team and interact with other cross functional teams.
  • Participate in code reviews, training and knowledge buildup of the team.
  • Experience with automotive software development frameworks and tools: AUTOSAR, CAN, Ethernet.
  • Basic knowledge/know how on automotive safety and security standards: ISO 26262
  • Good to have knowledge on instrument cluster systems, including hardware and software components
  • Deep knowledge of developing C++ applications in a multi-threaded environment for Real time embedded systems.
  • Good understanding of Computer fundamentals including processor Architectures (specially ARM).
  • Working experience in one or more of the following OS Linux / QNX / Integrity / AUTOSAR.
  • Good knowledge of software development tools and methodologies specially Agile.
  • Good communication skills and fast learning ability.
  • Ability to perform task prioritization and time management.
  • Prior Automotive Software development experience (Infotainment/Instrument Cluster) would be additional benefit.
  • GIT / Gerrit and Jenkins knowledge
  • knowledge on linux containers Hypervisiors

title: Urgent Hiring -  ITI / Diploma / Freshers - Mumbai

placeholders.label: Mumbai Suburbs, Navi Mumbai, Mumbai (All Areas)

jobDescription:
Mandatory Requirements* :-

  • Should have a valid Driving License for both two and four wheeler.
  • Should Know how to drive a Car (Manual & Automatic).
  • Should have a personal two wheeler.
  • Should be ok with Field Job.

Kickstart Your Career as an Evaluation Engineer at CARS24!

Are you a recent ITI / Diploma / fresh graduate with a passion for cars and a desire to jumpstart your career in the automotive industry? Do you have a keen interest in car mechanics and a willingness to learn on the job? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you!


Position: Evaluation Engineer


Location: Mumbai (all region)


Job Responsibilities:

  • Technical Evaluation: Learn to perform comprehensive evaluations of used cars to assess their condition.
  • Detailed Reporting: Assist in submitting detailed reports for each car according to the defined process.
  • Repair Estimation: Help estimate the repair work needed for the used cars.
  • Market Pricing: Assist in estimating the market price of the cars based on your inspection.

We Are Looking For:

  • Educational Background: Fresh graduates with an ITI certification in automotive or related fields.
  • Eager Learner: Willingness to learn and develop new skills in car evaluation and inspection.
  • Technical Interest: Basic understanding of car engines, parts/components, and automotive mechanics.
  • Driving Skills: Valid driving license and a passion for cars and driving.
  • Customer Interaction: Basic customer handling skills and a positive attitude.

Why Join CARS24?

  • Learning Opportunity: Gain hands-on experience and training in car evaluation and inspection.
  • Career Growth: Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
  • Innovative Culture: Be part of a forward-thinking team thats transforming the automotive industry.
  • Great Perks: Competitive salary, comprehensive benefits, and a supportive work environment.
  • Passion and Profession: Combine your love for cars and driving with a rewarding career.

Contact Person:- Aayush kharkwal

Contact Number:- 8448285788
